member.name: T:HangFire.Web.AspNetBackgroundJobServer
member.summary: Represents the HangFire server that implements the interface.

member.name: M:HangFire.Web.AspNetBackgroundJobServer.#ctor(System.Int32,System.String[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the number of workers and the list of queues that will be processed by this instance of a server.
member.param: The list of queues that will be processed.

member.name: M:HangFire.Web.AspNetBackgroundJobServer.#ctor(System.String[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the default number of workers and the specified list of queues that will be processed by this instance of a server.
member.param: The list of queues that will be processed.

member.name: M:HangFire.Web.AspNetBackgroundJobServer.Start
member.summary: Starts the server and places it in the list of registered objects in the application.

member.name: M:HangFire.Web.AspNetBackgroundJobServer.Stop
member.summary: Disposes the server and removes it from the list of registered objects in the application.
